Synopsis: Adds permissions to a Group Policy Object (GPO) in Active Directory.
Description: This function allows you to add permissions to a specified GPO in Active Directory. You can specify the GPO by name, GUID, or apply permissions to all GPOs. Various parameters allow you to customize the permission settings.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Add-GPOZaurrPermission -GPOName "TestGPO" -Principal "User1" -PermissionType Read -PermitType Allow
Adds read permission to "User1" for the GPO named "TestGPO".

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Add-GPOZaurrPermission -GPOGuid "12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890AB" -Principal "Group1" -PermissionType Write -PermitType Deny
Denies write permission to "Group1" for the GPO with the specified GUID.
